mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO district_info ( id, code, name, parent_id, parent_code, is_wyn88_synchronized, creator_id, create_time, is_visible, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id},#{item.code},#{item.name},#{item.parentId},#{item.parentCode},#{item.isWyn88Synchronized},#{item.creatorId},#{item.createTime},#{item.isVisible},#{item.isDeleted})
